Name: F-16 Shot
Ingredients: 15 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring ingredients in the order listed.
Review: May not break the sound barrier but at least it layers well.
History: Named for the F-16 jet and closely related to the B-52.
